explains: adj. 地球的；尘世的；可能的
wordGroup: on earthly [口语] , ◎根本没有…,毫无(后接chance, good, use, reason 等) , ◎(系 earthly chance, good, hope, use 等的省略)毫无机会(或可能、希望、用处等)
earthly paradise 地上乐园，人间天堂

sentences.en: The fay lived in groups called the faerie, between the heavenly and earthly realms.
sentences.cn: fay 合群而居就称为 faerie，生活在仙境和尘世之间 。

sentences.en: There's no earthly reason why you shouldn't go.
There's no earthly reason for me to feel so blue.
sentences.cn: 我完全没有理由感到如此低落。
